benefit.text:
**Tier:** 3
**Prerequisites:** Pneuma Strike (two different elements)
**Description:** Most spellcasters struggle to weave even two energies in careful ritual. You've learned to blend them in the chaos of combat
**Benefit:** When using Pneuma Strike, you can spend 4 Energy (instead of 2) to channel two elements simultaneously:
- Make weaving checks for BOTH elements
- Count total successes across both checks

**Usage:** Replaces normal Pneuma Strike usage, costs 4 Energy
**Keyword:** [Combat], [Ascetic], [Magic]
